posts.post_title: Looking to trade T201 Mecca Crawford / Cobb PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Sports Card Investment Pros
I'm looking to trade a T201 Mecca Crawford / Cobb in a PSA 4 for a PSA 4 T205 Johnson, Mathewson, or Young.  Our user name on Ebay is sportscardinvestmentpros and we have a 100%.  Please let me know what you have available and Thanks!!!
